title: First win of the day not rewarded.
body:
I login, check to see what quests are available.
I only have 1st win of the day.
I just Q for ranked solo/duo. 
I play a game. I win the game.
No quest reward.
First Win of the day quest still available.


Good day.

replies.body: I'm seeing a few of these reports of this first win mission bugging out slightly for EUNE. I haven't been able to fix it myself quite yet, so please submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to your EUNE agents asking them to take a very close look at this. It may very well be some bug on our end, but we need to investigate further.
